For more information, please refer to ", "url": "https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/blob/master/LICENSE", "type": "", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/license", "tags": "$:/tags/License", "license-type": "Unlicense" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme": { "text": "This plugin adds the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Choose/Caption}} button to the View Toolbar and also the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab to the Sidebar. The button becomes <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} when selected and then the tiddler appears in the list on the {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or track-pad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded favorites can be removed from the list by using the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} button in the tiddler. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/favorites to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Icon * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/SideBar": { "text": "\define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]]'>

} .tc-favorites { stroke: {{!!button-outline-color}}; stroke-width:5; fill: {{!!button-color}}; } .tc-image-star-filled { height:1em; width:1em; }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "tab-icon-unselected-color": "#999", "tab-icon-selected-color": "#ff0", "tab-icon-outline-color": "#000", "caption": "Favorites", "button-outline-color": "#000", "button-color": "#ff0" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/template": { "text": "\define add() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define my-svg() \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]is[current]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} m='64,96.1' path={{$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/image!!path}}> <> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}}/> <$list filter='[all[current]!list[$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Choose/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Choose/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Choose/Caption}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/favorites/template", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/more-tiddler-actions", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint}}", "caption": "{{ $:/core/images/star-filled}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption}}" } } }
